title: Be The Hero
desc: Be The Hero is a project done during 'OmniStack 11.0 Week' that aims to connect people who want to make monetary contributions to NGOs that need help.

title: Japa Food
desc: This project is a virtual menu de products of a Japanese restaurant. Where the user can choose the products and verify the price.

title: Proffy
desc: Proffy is an online study platform, where students can connect with teachers of different subjects, in order to schedule classes.

title: Pizzaria XDS
desc: This project was a challenge in a selection process, the platform displayed a list of pizzas with their respective prices.
